content.extracted_text: ## MARTES 01 DE ABRIL DEL 2025 CORREO, CHIQUITAS, 8 ## GRAN ANGULAR ### CONCLUYE LA LIMPIEZA DE 35 KM DEL RÍO RÍMAC Tras dos meses de trabajo, la Autoridad Nacional del Agua (ANA) culminó las labores de limpieza y descolmatación de 35 kilómetros del cauce del río Rímac en la zona de Lima Este. Los trabajos se efectuaron de manera preventiva, ante la temporada de lluvias y de eventuales huaicos. ### Description The image depicts a construction scene along a riverbank. Several pieces of heavy machinery are visible, including excavators and bulldozers, all of which are yellow. The machinery is aligned in a row, working on what appears to be a land development or riverbank reinforcement project. The excavator in the foreground is actively digging or moving earth, while the bulldozers follow behind, likely leveling or compacting the soil. The setting is outdoors, with a clear sky and distant mountains visible in the background. The river runs parallel to the machinery, and there are sparse trees and vegetation along the bank. The scene suggests a large-scale engineering project, possibly for flood prevention or infrastructure development. The machinery is positioned on a dirt path, indicating ongoing construction work.
